column4: Good day (evening, night, morning).  Can someone point me to instructions on upgrading from fiesty to gutsy using my local apt-mirror
can you not do it through the Update Manager?
Should I just use the server method on my server and kubuntu systems

if you go to a terminal, type sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list and change all instances of feisty to gutsy (press Ctrl-X to exit) then sudo apt-get update and sudo apt-get dist-upgrade, that should do it.
